item.title: Otsi cyberpet - mk1
item.description: Otsi is a winning design of a cyberpet made for Cyberdeck Cafe’s contest. Main objective of this contest was to build your personal companion that would need to be taken care of and would serve a real life purpose like helping you with everyday tasks.

item.title: Atrovel calculator
item.description: Atrovel calculator is a project that originated from one of my schools lessons. We were learning how to use 4x4 button matrix and bored Simon decided that it would be a great idea to make a simple calculator.

item.title: One-key keyboard
item.description: This is yet another project made for a contest hosted by Cyberdeck Cafe. The objective was to create a keyboard that, as the name suggests, has only one button. Everything else was up to you.
